mapper.insert: insert into payments (merchant_uid, membershipNum, userNum, paymentsDate, paymentsTime, applyNum, amount, method, paymentsCk) values (#{merchant_uid}, null, null, now(), null, null, null, null, 'n')
mapper.update: update payments set membershipNum = #{membershipNum}, userNum = #{userNum}, paymentsTime = #{paymentsTime}, applyNum = #{applyNum}, amount = #{amount}, method = #{method}, paymentsCk = #{paymentsCk} where merchant_uid = #{merchant_uid}
